The Population Estimates dataset was collected 
from the following website:
http://www.census.gov/population

Population estimates of various states in the U.S.A are available from years 1900-1999.
These are available in the file "population.txt".

File Description: It is an ASCII file.

The 1st column corresponds to the year.
The second column gives the population estimates for the whole of USA in each year.
Each of the later columns give population estimates for each state that is labeled
by the 2-letter state code in the 1st row of the file.
